text: A dark screen is lit up by twinkling stars .
Baba?

Millions of years ago , a meteorite made of vibranium, the strongest substance in the universe struck the continent of Africa affecting the plant life around it. The meteorite hits Africa and we see plant life and anima affected by vibranium.

And when the time of man came , five tribes settled on it and called it Wakanda. The tribes lived in constant war with each other until a warrior shaman received a vision from the Panther goddess Bast who led him to the Heart Shaped Herb, a plant that granted him super human strength , speed, and instincts. A visual representation of the five tribes emerges as han from the sand animation, and we see them unite , and then break apart as conflict arises . Bashenga rises above the conflict and eats the Heart Shaped Herb, proceeding to un the tribes .
The warrior became King and the first Black Panther , the protector of Wakanda .
Four tribes agreed to live under the King's rule , but the Jabari tribe isolated themselves in the mountains. We see the Jabari striding off towards the isolated mount region.

The Wakandans used vibranium to develop technology more advanced than any other nation , but as Wakanda thrived the world around it descended further into chaos. We see images of war and slavery just outside Wakanda ' s secretive border .

To keep vibranium safe , the Wakandans vowed to hide in plain sight, keeping the truth of their power from the outside world. We see the protective barrier rise around the Wakandan ci as we pull back on the Earth as it spins, now zooming in another part of the world ..В·

He lets Killmonger swing towards him and dodges , backing even closer to the edge of the track, and Killmonger swin again - but this time T'Challa punches Killmonger's arm , jarring the blade lose and sending it flying up into the T'Challa then does a ROLLING ARMBAR TAKEDOWN the

SPEAR flips through the air. We track with the spear as the SONIC STABILIZATION FIELD turns off , and the train passes the two fighters . As th BROKENSPEAR drops T'Challa catches it with his right hand and slams it into Killmonger's chest, just as both their suits form around them . Killmonger removes his helmet , then looks down at the bl that is buried in his chest . T'Challa, realizing this is it , removes his mask as well 117 .
Hell of a move . Killmonger struggles to breathe.

My pops said Wakanda was the most beautiful thing he'd ever seen. He promised he was going to show it to me some day . Can you believe that? Kid from Oakland running around believing in fairy tales. Killmonger winces from the pain . T'Challa stands and pic Killmonger up , dragging him to his feet .
T'Challa supports Killmonger as both men ride a vibranium lift towards the mouth of the mine .
T'Challa stands at the top of the great mound next to Killmonger who is kneeling . Watching the sun creep down behind the horizon.
It's beautiful . T'Challa thinks for a long beat.
Maybe we can still heal you . Killmonger thinks on this .

Why? So you can just lock me up? Nah . Just bury me in the ocean, with my ancestors that jumped from the ships . . . 'cause they knew death was better than bondage. Killmonger pulls the knife out of his chest, killing hims instantly. T'Challa looks down at his cousin's now lifele body and becomes emotional.
In full royal regalia , T'Challa strolls in with confiden 118 .
Shuri , Ramonda , the Dora, including Okoye , Ayo and all Elders, even M'Baku, are present .
T'Challa and Nakia stand together.
Thank you. You saved me. You saved my family . Our nation.
There is nothing to thank me for. It is our duty to . .. it was my duty to fight for what I love . I should
T'Challa kisses her .
You can't blame me I almost died . Nakia looks at him deeply, and kisses him back.
Stay . I think I know a way you can still fulfill your calling. Please stay. Nakia looks at T' Challa with curious eyes. She kisses hi
T'Challa and Shuri, dressed in subtle clothing , look at now abandoned apartment building . In the distance a grou SIX KIDS (mostly Black, some Latino), play three on a rug basketball hoop .
When you said you would take me to California for the first time, I thought you meant Coachella, or Disneyland . Why here?

This is where our father killed our uncle. Shuri looks at T'Challa, shocked by his bluntness. She tu and stares closely at the building. We see her POV of lar SIGNAGE that hints that the building is soon to be demolished . 119.
They are tearing it down. Good.
They're not tearing it down . . . I bought this building. Shuri turns to him confused .
And that building , and that one over there ... This will be the first Wakandan International Outreach Center . Shuri smiles at the surprise.
Nakia will oversee the social outreach ... And you will spearhead the science and information exchange . Shuri turns to T'Challa in shock at what this means.

You're kidding ! T'Challa hits a button on his Kimoyo bead , and the RTF c out of cloaking , revealing itself to have been parked be the kids playing basketball . A YOUNG BLACKKID turns back to see the ship as the other kids collectively lose their shit .
What? ! Man what the hell is that?
That's like a Buggati space ship !
Woah, it came out of nowhere !!! Did y'all see that?
What . ..
They start to run up to the ship and touch it . Unsure at first .
We can take this back to the house y'all. .. 120 .
We could pull up to school in this !
Hey look , we can break it apart and we can sell it!
On Ebay!
Everybody get like a million a piece . She starts off towards the kids, walking past the Young B Kid.
Uhhh I wouldn't do that if I were you guys ...
Where you come from?
From Wakanda .
What is a Wakanda? The Young Black Kid approaches T'Challa .
Hey yo ! Is this yours?
Who... who are you? T'Challa thinks on this and smiles .

text: T'Challa walks , flanked by Nakia, Okoye and Ayo . 121 .
Several assembly members move around the room preparing f meeting . Suddenly a hush falls over the hall as the Waka enter and walk up to the center pit.

My name is King T'Challa , son of King T'Chaka . I am the sovereign ruler of the Nation of Wakanda and for the first time in our history we will be sharing our knowledge and resources with the outside world. Wakanda will no longer watch from the shadows . We cannot , we must not. We will work to be an example of how we as brothers and sisters on this Earth should treat each other . Now more than ever , illusions of division threaten our very e x istence. We all know the truth : more connects us than separates us . In times of crisis , the wise build bridges , while the foolish build barriers . We must find a way to look after one another, as if we were one single tribe . The audience of WORLD LEADERS look around , bemused, wond what Wakanda could possibly have to offer .
can't help but lean into his microphone .
